name: BOE Partners
features: Secure user registration and login system using bcrypt for password hashing.
User profiles with personalized data and customizable avatars stored in MongoDB
JWT used for authorization and session management.
Full CRUD app, including ability to like each school and store in favorites
about: Filter, like and register to South Florida schools, customize your profile, view upcoming events, read blogs, and access exclusive content. User registration system is integrated, employing bcrypt for password hashing. Implements session management, authentication, and authorization.

name: Medications Tracker
features: Secure user registration and login system employing bcrypt for password hashing
JWT-based authentication and authorization ensuring secure user sessions
User profile management feature allowing avatar changes and account info editing
Comprehensive medication tracking system allowing for addition, update, and soft deletion of medication records
about: Implements bcrypt for password hashing and JWT for session management. User-friendly interface for medication management, history tracking, and profile customization, including avatar changes. Deployed on AWS, using an EC2 instance for the API, S3 bucket and route53 for the front-end.

name: AI Therapy
features: User-friendly interface that simulates a real human therapist.
Integration with ChatGPT API to provide AI-driven conversation.
Built in react with a NodeJS backend and deployed on GCP.
AI generated images using prompt engineering.
about: Simulates a real human therapist using the ChatGPT API. Provides a user-friendly interface and personalized experiences for users. Deployed on the GCP cloud, the app is built in React with a NodeJS and Express backend. It also features AI-generated images using prompt engineering.

name: Tasks Manager
features: Full CRUD operations for task management.
User registration and login system.
Authentication and authorization for enhanced security.
about: Allows users to manage their tasks effectively, enabling users to create, read, update, and delete tasks. Incluedes user registration and login system, along with authentication and authorization mechanisms. The application is deployed in GCP.

name: Musician Portfolio
features: Responsive design that ensures the website looks good on all devices.
Smooth navigation for a user-friendly experience.
Showcase of the musician's work, including pictures and videos
Contact form for easy communication.
about: Built only using HTML5 and CSS3. The website features a responsive design, ensuring it looks good on all devices. It also includes smooth navigation, a showcase of the musician's work, including audio clips and videos, and a contact form for easy communication.

name: Quiz App
features: Interactive quizzes or exams with instant feedback.
Data fetched from a JSON file for dynamic quiz generation.
Use of React Hooks for state management and side effects.
Responsive design ensuring the app looks good on all devices.
about: Interactive application that simulates a quiz and provides instant feedback to the user. The application fetches data from a JSON file to generate dynamic quizzes. It also features a responsive design, ensuring the app looks good on all devices.

name: SPN Identification
features: ML algorithm for identifying Solitary Pulmonary Nodules
CT scan image processing
Medical imaging analysis
about: Research project implementing a sophisticated MATLAB machine learning algorithm for early detection of Solitary Pulmonary Nodules (SPN) in CT lung scans. The algorithm employs advanced image segmentation techniques, feature extraction methods, and classification models to accurately identify potential nodules.

name: Image Object Identification
features: Object detection in images
Machine learning algorithms
Computer vision techniques
about: Advanced computer vision project implemented in Python using deep learning frameworks to perform real-time object detection and classification in images. The system utilizes pre-trained convolutional neural networks (CNNs) optimized for accuracy and speed, supporting multiple object detection in a single image.

name: Breast Cancer Detection
features: Multiple ML algorithm comparison
Medical diagnosis prediction
Data analysis and visualization
about: Breast cancer detection system that implements and compares multiple machine learning algorithms including Logistic Regression, Decision Trees, and Random Forest.

name: Chronic Kidney Disease
features: Artificial Neural Networks implementation
Medical condition prediction
Healthcare data analysis
about: Advanced medical diagnostic tool utilizing Artificial Neural Networks to predict Chronic Kidney Disease (CKD). The system analyzes multiple patient parameters including blood pressure, specific gravity, albumin, and other clinical indicators.

name: Parkinson's Disease
features: Disease prediction algorithms
Healthcare data processing
Machine learning models
about: Sophisticated Parkinson's Disease detection system implemented in Python, utilizing advanced machine learning techniques to analyze voice recordings and movement patterns. The algorithm processes multiple biomarkers including vocal frequency variations, tremor patterns, and movement metrics.

name: Diabetes Mellitus
features: Clinical history analysis
Disease prediction
Web-based interface
about: Comprehensive web-based diabetes prediction system that combines machine learning with clinical data analysis. The algorithm processes multiple patient parameters including glucose levels, BMI, age, and other relevant clinical indicators.
